entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Kakabeka Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 p.m. EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
